name: MessageBox.setBlock
description: Set member list of allows and blocks for a user.

inputs.notes: Yes or No are valied values. Used to send corporate broadcast messages
List of IDs of who to block (comma separated)
List of IDs to allow, comma separated
List of IDs to remove from the whitelist and blacklist
Allow upline broadcast ~@~ is the default value
Allow upline broadcast to users downline
Allow corp to broadcast to user
Allow promo to broadcast to user
